description:
"Fmylife.com contains a daily dose of short anecdotes, based on a simple recipe: in a few sentences, users can tell everyone the shitty moment which ruined their day "

This app allows you to read the stories published on Fmylife directly from your webOS device 
You can see them sorted by date, by category or randomly
Logged in user can also vote for a given FML, add it to their favorites & share them via email, sms, etc.

If you encounter any problems while using this app, please contact me before rating it & I will be more than happy to help you

Enjoy !

-- New in v 0.2 --
You can now submit your own FML to the website (if you are logged in)
You can now sign up directly from the first screen

-- Reminder --
You have to be logged in to vote for a FML, add a comment or add it to your favorites (and now to submit a FML)
